name: Dedicated
description: The temple is dedicated and operating normally.

name: Closed for Renovation
description: The temple is closed for renovations for a significant period of time. It will need to be rededicated.

name: Under Construction
description: The temple is currently under construction.

name: Announced
description: The temple has been announced but groundbreaking has not yet occurred.

name: Closed
description: The temple has been indefinitely closed.
